评论概述: A good fit and cozy for the home
评论详情: I ordered this for my wife and she likes it. She said it was cozy and fit well (medium). She will happily wear it around the home. Can't find anything to complain about here. We'll see how it holds up over time, use and washing.

评论概述: Something cute and comfy to wearing while working at home
评论详情: I ordered the blue set, and when I say it's blue, I mean blue, it's almost an electric blue.  Not a fan of the loud color but that's a "me" thing, no fault of the product at all.  I washed it before wearing and the color stayed true. I'm a curvy girl and the fit was nice and very flattering.  Very comfortable and just the right amount of stretch, not too confining at all. I'm 5'7 and the length was perfect.  I can wear this while working at home, for working out, or running errands, so it's worth the investment.

I was hunting for comfortable travel, airport outfit, and this one is perfect. The versatility to make this casual or dressy is perfect. The fit is amazing and I got a two XL in the quality in the stretch in this outfit is amazing  For the tall ladies, the pants are long for our thicker ladies on the bottom the stretch is perfect. It gives you that room to move and breathe and not feel constricted. The jacket as well. Have a nice day and head to it and it also has a nice stretch. I did not notice any moments where it was see-through. It seems to have some good protection, so you cannot see through the fabric.

I’m normally an xl in tops & large in bottoms, so I went with the large in this set. The stretch on this is good, I probably could’ve did a medium. The material is soft and ribbed. The set is polyester and it’s well sewn. The material is just the right density, I love that the sleeve cuffs and the ends of pants have a form fit. I had no problems with the zipper. This comes in several colors, I got the royal blue and it’s very vibrant. This is very comfortable and the price on it is reasonable. Great tracksuit!
This 2pc outfit is good quality. Easy fit. Lightweight. Soft fabric. Has elastic for a better fitting. Looks good on me. Received many compliments. Recieved.

This is a very comfortable and lightweight sweatsuit.  I especially love how the jacket accentuates the waist line.  It is hooded and great for any casual day.
Jacket and pants set. Soft and stretchy. Figure hugging. Good range of motion. Light weight material.

Very cute, it has a lot of stretch so I would say size down. I am usually a xxl in these sets and the pants were a little big. The length of the pants are great, the fit of the jacket is great and I can’t wait to run errands in this nice set.

This was a cute set but the bottoms were huge on me. I ordered a small. I typically wear small in bottoms or size 5 or 7, depends.  These were huge but the top was perfect and nice fit. I gave the bottoms to my daughter who is curvier than me. She wears a 9 and the small was perfect on her.

This stretch 2-piece set is perfect for casual wear. I ordered in Size Small and it Fits as Expected. It’s sewn well: pants are a simple pull on and the jacket has zipper and tie string for the hoodie.  And yes, the jacket has 2 pockets in the front. The fabric is mainly a very lightweight polyester fabric with a lot of stretch to it. I washed and dried on Normal Warm settings and it laundered fine without fabric color bleed and no wrinkling. This is a good outfit to throw on for casual and comfy wear.
Soft and stretchy. Vibrant color. Washes with no issues.
